original: Majjhima Nikāya 89
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Dhammacetiyasutta
analyzed: dhammacetiya sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sakkesu viharati medāḷupaṁ nāma sakyānaṁ nigamo.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sakkesu viharati medāḷupam nāma sakyānam nigamaḥ

original: Tena kho pana samayena rājā pasenadi kosalo nagarakaṁ anuppatto hoti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ nagarakam anuppattaḥ hoti kenacid eva karaṇīyena

original: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo dīghaṁ kārāyanaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha khalu rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ dīgham kārāyanam āmantesi

original: “yojehi, samma kārāyana, bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni, uyyānabhūmiṁ gacchāma subhūmiṁ dassanāyā”ti.
analyzed: yojehi samma kārāyana bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni uyyāna bhūmim gacchāma su bhūmim dassanāya ati

original: “Evaṁ, devā”ti kho dīgho kārāyano rañño pasenadissa kosalassa paṭissutvā bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni yojāpetvā rañño pasenadissa kosalassa paṭivedesi:
analyzed: eva deva ati kho dīghaḥ kārāyanaḥ raññaḥ pasenadissa kosalassa paṭissutvā bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni yojāpetvā raññaḥ pasenadissa kosalassa paṭivedesi

original: “yuttāni kho te, deva, bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni.
analyzed: yuttāni khalu te deva bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni

original: Yassadāni kālaṁ maññasī”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ sadāni kālam maññasi iti

original: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo bhadraṁ yānaṁ abhiruhitvā bhadrehi bhadrehi yānehi nagarakamhā niyyāsi mahaccā rājānubhāvena.
analyzed: atha khalu rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ bhadram yānam abhiruhitvā bhadrehi bhadrehi yānehi nagara kamhā niyyāsi mahat ca rāja anubhāvena

original: Yena ārāmo tena pāyāsi.
analyzed: yena tena

original: Yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi, yānena gantvā yānā paccorohitvā pattikova ārāmaṁ pāvisi.
analyzed: yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi yānena gantvā yānā paccorohitvā pattikā uva ārāmam pāvisi

original: Addasā kho rājā pasenadi kosalo ārāme jaṅghāvihāraṁ anucaṅkamamāno anuvicaramāno
analyzed: addasā kho rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ ārāme jaṅghāvihāram anucaṅkamamānaḥ anuvicaramānaḥ

original: rukkhamūlāni pāsādikāni pasādanīyāni appasaddāni appanigghosāni vijanavātāni manussarāhasseyyakāni
analyzed: rukkha mūlāni pāsādikāni pasādanīyāni appa saddāni appa nigghosāni vijana vātāni manussa rāhasseyyakāni

original: paṭisallānasāruppāni.
analyzed: paṭisallāna sāruppāni

original: Disvāna bhagavantaṁyeva ārabbha sati udapādi:
analyzed: disvāna bhagavantayā iva ārabbha sati udapādi

original: “imāni kho tāni rukkhamūlāni pāsādikāni pasādanīyāni appasaddāni appanigghosāni vijanavātāni
analyzed: imāni kho tāni rukkha mūlāni pāsādikāni pasādanīyāni appa saddāni appa nigghosāni vijana vātāni

original: manussarāhasseyyakāni paṭisallānasāruppāni, yattha sudaṁ mayaṁ taṁ bhagavantaṁ payirupāsāma
analyzed: manussa rāhasseyyakāni paṭisallāna sāruppāni yattha sudam mayam tam bhagavantam payirupāsāma

original: arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhan”ti.
analyzed: arahantam sammāsambuddha iti

original: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo dīghaṁ kārāyanaṁ āmantesi:
analyzed: atha khalu rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ dīgham kārāyanam āmantesi

original: “imāni kho, samma kārāyana, tāni rukkhamūlāni pāsādikāni pasādanīyāni appasaddāni
analyzed: imāni kho samma kārāyana tāni rukkha mūlāni pāsādikāni pasādanīyāni appasaddāni

original: appanigghosāni vijanavātāni manussarāhasseyyakāni paṭisallānasāruppāni, yattha sudaṁ
analyzed: appa nigghosāni vijana vātāni manussa rāhasseyyakāni paṭisallāna sāruppāni yattha suda

original: mayaṁ taṁ bhagavantaṁ payirupāsāma arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhaṁ.
analyzed: mayam tam bhagavantam payis upāsāma arahantam sammāsambuddha

original: Kahaṁ nu kho, samma kārāyana, etarahi so bhagavā viharati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho”ti?
analyzed: kaham nu kho samma kārāyana etarahi saḥ bhagavā viharati araham sammāsambuddhaḥ iti

original: “Atthi, mahārāja, medāḷupaṁ nāma sakyānaṁ nigamo.
analyzed: atthi mahā rāja medāḷupam nāma sakyānam nigamaḥ

original: Tattha so bhagavā etarahi viharati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho”ti.
analyzed: tattha saḥ bhagavā etarahi viharati araham sammāsambuddhaḥ iti

original: “Kīvadūre pana, samma kārāyana, nagarakamhā medāḷupaṁ nāma sakyānaṁ nigamo hotī”ti?
analyzed: kīvadūre pana samma kārāyana nagarakamhā medāḷupam nāma sakyānam nigamaḥ hoti iti

original: “Na dūre, mahārāja;
analyzed: na dūre mahā rāja

original: tīṇi yojanāni;
analyzed: tīṇi yojanāni

original: sakkā divasāvasesena gantun”ti.
analyzed: sakkā divasa avasesena gantun ti

original: “Tena hi, samma kārāyana, yojehi bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni, gamissāma mayaṁ taṁ bhagavantaṁ dassanāya arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhan”ti.
analyzed: tena hi samma kārāyana yojehi bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni gamissāma mayam tam bhagavantam dassanāya arahantam sammāsambuddhanti

original: “Evaṁ, devā”ti kho dīgho kārāyano rañño pasenadissa kosalassa paṭissutvā bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni yojāpetvā rañño pasenadissa kosalassa paṭivedesi:
analyzed: eva deva ati kho dīghaḥ kārāyanaḥ raññaḥ pasenadissa kosalassa paṭissutvā bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni yojāpetvā raññaḥ pasenadissa kosalassa paṭivedesi

original: “yuttāni kho te, deva, bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni.
analyzed: yuttāni khalu te deva bhadrāni bhadrāni yānāni

original: Yassadāni kālaṁ maññasī”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ sadāni kālam maññasi iti

original: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo bhadraṁ yānaṁ abhiruhitvā bhadrehi bhadrehi yānehi nagarakamhā yena medāḷupaṁ nāma sakyānaṁ nigamo tena pāyāsi.
analyzed: atha khalu rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ bhadram yānam abhiruhitvā bhadrehi bhadrehi yānehi nagarakamhā yena medāḷupam nāma sakyānam tena

original: Teneva divasāvasesena medāḷupaṁ nāma sakyānaṁ nigamaṁ sampāpuṇi.
analyzed: tena iva divasa avasesena medāḷupam nāma sakyānam nigamam sampāpuṇi

original: Yena ārāmo tena pāyāsi.
analyzed: yena tena

original: Yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi, yānena gantvā yānā paccorohitvā pattikova ārāmaṁ pāvisi.
analyzed: yāvatikā yānassa bhūmi yānena gantvā yānā paccorohitvā pattikā uva ārāmam pāvisi

original: Tena kho pana samayena sambahulā bhikkhū abbhokāse caṅkamanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena sambahulāḥ bhikkhū abbhokāse caṅkamanti

original: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo yena te bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū etadavoca:
analyzed: atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ yena te bhikkhū tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā te bhikkhū etat avoca

original: “kahaṁ nu kho, bhante, etarahi so bhagavā viharati arahaṁ sammāsambuddho?
analyzed: kaham nu kho bhante etarahi saḥ bhagavā viharati araham sammāsambuddhaḥ

original: Dassanakāmā hi mayaṁ taṁ bhagavantaṁ arahantaṁ sammāsambuddhan”ti.
analyzed: dassana kāmāḥ hi mayam tam bhagavantam arahantam sammāsambuddhan ti

original: “Eso, mahārāja, vihāro saṁvutadvāro. Tena appasaddo upasaṅkamitvā ataramāno āḷindaṁ pavisitvā ukkāsitvā aggaḷaṁ ākoṭehi. Vivarissati bhagavā te dvāran”ti.
analyzed: esaḥ mahā rāja vihāraḥ savuta dvāro tena appasaddaḥ upasaṅkamitvā a taramānaḥ āḷindam pavisitvā ukkāsitvā aggaḷam ākoṭehi vivarissati bhagavā te dvāram ti

original: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo tattheva khaggañca uṇhīsañca dīghassa kārāyanassa pādāsi.
analyzed: atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ tattha iva khaggañca uṇhīsañca dīghassa kārāyanassa

original: Atha kho dīghassa kārāyanassa etadahosi:
analyzed: atha kho dīghassa kārāyanassa etat ahosi

original: “rahāyati kho dāni rājā, idheva dāni mayā ṭhātabban”ti.
analyzed: rahāyati kho dāni rājā idhā iva dāni mayā ṭhātabbanti

original: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo yena so vihāro saṁvutadvāro tena appasaddo upasaṅkamitvā ataramāno āḷindaṁ pavisitvā ukkāsitvā aggaḷaṁ ākoṭesi. Vivari bhagavā dvāraṁ.
analyzed: atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ yena saḥ vihāraḥ savuta dvāro tena appasaddaḥ upasaṅkamitvā a taramānaḥ āḷindam pavisitvā ukkāsitvā aggaḷam ākoṭesi bhagavā dvāra

original: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo vihāraṁ pavisitvā bhagavato pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavato pādāni mukhena ca paricumbati, pāṇīhi ca parisambāhati, nāmañca sāveti:
analyzed: atha khalu rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ vihāram pavisitvā bhagavataḥ pādesu sirasā nipatitvā bhagavataḥ pādāni mukhena ca paricumbati pāṇīhi ca parisambāhati nāman ca sāva iti

original: “rājāhaṁ, bhante, pasenadi kosalo;
analyzed: rājā āha bhante pasenadi kosalo

original: rājāhaṁ, bhante, pasenadi kosalo”ti.
analyzed: rājā āha bhante pasenadi kosala iti

original: “Kiṁ pana tvaṁ, mahārāja, atthavasaṁ sampassamāno imasmiṁ sarīre evarūpaṁ paramanipaccakāraṁ karosi, mittūpahāraṁ upadaṁsesī”ti?
analyzed: kim pana tva mahā rāja atthavasam sampassamānaḥ imasmin sarīre evarūpam parama nipaccakāram karosi mittūpahāram upadasesi iti

original: “Atthi kho me, bhante, bhagavati dhammanvayo hoti:
analyzed: atthi kho me bhante bhagavati dhamma anvayaḥ hoti

original: ‘sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo, suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho’ti.
analyzed: sammāsambuddhaḥ bhagavā su ākkhātaḥ bhagavatā dhammo su paṭipannaḥ bhagavataḥ sāvaka saṅghaḥ iti

original: Idhāhaṁ, bhante, passāmi eke samaṇabrāhmaṇe pariyantakataṁ brahmacariyaṁ carante dasapi vassāni, vīsampi vassāni, tiṁsampi vassāni, cattārīsampi vassāni.
analyzed: idha aha bhante passāmi eke samaṇa brāhmaṇe pariyantakatam brahmacariyam carante dasa pi vassāni vīsam pi vassāni tisam pi vassāni cattārīsam pi vassāni

original: Te aparena samayena sunhātā suvilittā kappitakesamassū pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitā samaṅgībhūtā paricārenti.
analyzed: te aparena samayena su nhātā su vilittā kappita kesa massū pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitā samaṅgībhūtā paricārenti

original: Idha panāhaṁ, bhante, bhikkhū passāmi yāvajīvaṁ āpāṇakoṭikaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carante.
analyzed: idha pana aha bhante bhikkhū passāmi yāvajīvam āpāṇakoṭikam paripuṇṇam parisuddham brahmacariyam carante

original: Na kho panāhaṁ, bhante, ito bahiddhā aññaṁ evaṁ paripuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ samanupassāmi.
analyzed: na kho pana āha bhante itas bahiddhā aññam evam paripuṇṇam parisuddham brahmacariyam samanupassāmi

original: Ayampi kho me, bhante, bhagavati dhammanvayo hoti:
analyzed: ayam pi kho me bhante bhagavati dhamma anvayaḥ hoti

original: ‘sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo, suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho’ti.
analyzed: sammāsambuddhaḥ bhagavā su ākkhātaḥ bhagavatā dhammo su paṭipannaḥ bhagavataḥ sāvaka saṅghaḥ iti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhante, rājānopi rājūhi vivadanti, khattiyāpi khattiyehi vivadanti,
analyzed: puna capara bhante rājānaḥ api rājūhi vivadanti khattiyā api khattiyehi vivadanti

original: brāhmaṇāpi brāhmaṇehi vivadanti, gahapatayopi gahapatīhi vivadanti, mātāpi puttena
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ api brāhmaṇehi vivadanti gahapatayaḥ api gahapatīhi vivadanti mātā api puttena

original: vivadati, puttopi mātarā vivadati, pitāpi puttena vivadati, puttopi pitarā vivadati,
analyzed: vivadati puttaḥ api mātarā vivadati pitā api puttena vivadati puttaḥ api pitarā vivadati

original: bhātāpi bhaginiyā vivadati, bhaginīpi bhātarā vivadati, sahāyopi sahāyena vivadati.
analyzed: bhātā api bhaginiyā vivadati bhaginī ipi bhātarā vivadati sahāyaḥ api sahāyena vivadati

original: Idha panāhaṁ, bhante, bhikkhū passāmi samagge sammodamāne avivadamāne khīrodakībhūte aññamaññaṁ piyacakkhūhi sampassante viharante.
analyzed: idha pana aha bhante bhikkhū passāmi samagge sammodamāne a vivadamāne khīrodakībhūte aññam aññam piya cakkhūhi sampassante viharante

original: Na kho panāhaṁ, bhante, ito bahiddhā aññaṁ evaṁ samaggaṁ parisaṁ samanupassāmi.
analyzed: na kho pana aha bhante itas bahiddhā aññam evam samaggam parisam samanupassāmi

original: Ayampi kho me, bhante, bhagavati dhammanvayo hoti:
analyzed: ayam pi kho me bhante bhagavati dhamma anvayaḥ hoti

original: ‘sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo, suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho’ti.
analyzed: sammāsambuddhaḥ bhagavā su ākkhātaḥ bhagavatā dhammo su paṭipannaḥ bhagavataḥ sāvaka saṅghaḥ iti

original: Puna caparāhaṁ, bhante, ārāmena ārāmaṁ, uyyānena uyyānaṁ anucaṅkamāmi anuvicarāmi.
analyzed: puna caparāha bhante ārāmena ārāme uyyānena uyyānam anucaṅkamāmi anuvicarāmi

original: Sohaṁ tattha passāmi eke samaṇabrāhmaṇe kise lūkhe dubbaṇṇe uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāte dhamanisanthatagatte, na viya maññe cakkhuṁ bandhante janassa dassanāya.
analyzed: so ham tattha passāmi eke samaṇa brāhmaṇe kise lūkhe dubbaṇṇe uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jāte dhamani santhata gatte na viya maññe cakkhum bandhante janassa dassanāya

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhante, etadahosi:
analyzed: tassa mayha bhante

original: ‘addhā ime āyasmanto anabhiratā vā brahmacariyaṁ caranti, atthi vā tesaṁ kiñci pāpaṁ kammaṁ kataṁ paṭicchannaṁ;
analyzed: addhā ime āyasmantaḥ an abhiratāḥ vā brahmacariyam caranti atthi vā tesam kiñci pāpam kammam katam paṭicchanna

original: tathā hi ime āyasmanto kisā lūkhā dubbaṇṇā uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā dhamanisanthatagattā, na viya maññe cakkhuṁ bandhanti janassa dassanāyā’ti.
analyzed: tathā hi ime āyasmanto kisāḥ lūkhāḥ dubbaṇṇāḥ uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jātāḥ dhamani santhata gattāḥ na viya maññe cakkhum bandhanti janassa dassanāya ati

original: Tyāhaṁ upasaṅkamitvā evaṁ vadāmi:
analyzed: tya aham upasaṅkamitvā evam vadāmi

original: ‘kiṁ nu kho tumhe āyasmanto kisā lūkhā dubbaṇṇā uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātā dhamanisanthatagattā, na viya maññe cakkhuṁ bandhatha janassa dassanāyā’ti?
analyzed: kim nu kho tumhe āyasmanto kisāḥ lūkhāḥ dubbaṇṇāḥ uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jātāḥ dhamani santhata gattāḥ na viya maññe cakkhum bandhatha janassa dassanāya ati

original: Te evamāhaṁsu:
analyzed: te

original: ‘bandhukarogo no, mahārājā’ti.
analyzed: bandhuka rogaḥ naḥ mahā rāja ati

original: Idha panāhaṁ, bhante, bhikkhū passāmi haṭṭhapahaṭṭhe udaggudagge abhiratarūpe pīṇindriye appossukke pannalome paradattavutte migabhūtena cetasā viharante.
analyzed: idha pana aha bhante bhikkhū passāmi haṭṭha pahaṭṭhe udagga udagge abhirata rūpe pīṇi indriye appa ussukke pannalome para datta vutte miga bhūtena cetasā viharante

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhante, etadahosi:
analyzed: tassa mayha bhante

original: ‘addhā ime āyasmanto tassa bhagavato sāsane uḷāraṁ pubbenāparaṁ visesaṁ jānanti;
analyzed: addhā ime āyasmantaḥ tassa bhagavato sāsane uḷāram pubbena aparam visesam jānanti

original: tathā hi ime āyasmanto haṭṭhapahaṭṭhā udaggudaggā abhiratarūpā pīṇindriyā appossukkā pannalomā paradattavuttā migabhūtena cetasā viharantī’ti.
analyzed: tathā hi ime āyasmantaḥ haṭṭha pahaṭṭhāḥ udaggudaggāḥ abhirata rūpā pīṇi indriyāḥ appa ussukkā panna lomā para datta vuttāḥ miga bhūtena cetasā viharanti iti

original: Ayampi kho me, bhante, bhagavati dhammanvayo hoti:
analyzed: ayam pi kho me bhante bhagavati dhamma anvayaḥ hoti

original: ‘sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo, suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho’ti.
analyzed: sammāsambuddhaḥ bhagavā su ākkhātaḥ bhagavatā dhammo su paṭipannaḥ bhagavataḥ sāvaka saṅghaḥ iti

original: Puna caparāhaṁ, bhante, rājā khattiyo muddhāvasitto;
analyzed: puna caparāha bhante rājā khattiyaḥ muddhāvasittaḥ

original: pahomi ghātetāyaṁ vā ghātetuṁ, jāpetāyaṁ vā jāpetuṁ, pabbājetāyaṁ vā pabbājetuṁ.
analyzed: pahomi ghāteta ayam vā ghātetu jāpeta ayam vā jāpetu pabbājeta ayam vā pabbājetu

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhante, aḍḍakaraṇe nisinnassa antarantarā kathaṁ opātenti.
analyzed: tassa bhante aḍḍakaraṇe nisinnassa antarantarā katham

original: Sohaṁ na labhāmi:
analyzed: sā uham na labhāmi

original: ‘mā me bhonto aḍḍakaraṇe nisinnassa antarantarā kathaṁ opātetha, kathāpariyosānaṁ me bhonto āgamentū’ti.
analyzed: mā me bhonto aḍḍakaraṇe nisinnassa antar antarā katham kathā pariyosānam me bhonto āgamentu uti

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhante, antarantarā kathaṁ opātenti.
analyzed: tassa bhante antarantarā katham

original: Idha panāhaṁ, bhante, bhikkhū passāmi;
analyzed: idha pana aha bhante bhikkhū passāmi

original: yasmiṁ samaye bhagavā anekasatāya parisāya dhammaṁ deseti, neva tasmiṁ samaye bhagavato sāvakānaṁ khipitasaddo vā hoti ukkāsitasaddo vā.
analyzed: yasmin samaye bhagavā aneka satāya parisāya dhammam deseti na iva tasmin samaye bhagavataḥ sāvakānam khipita saddaḥ vā hoti ukkāsita saddaḥ vā

original: Bhūtapubbaṁ, bhante, bhagavā anekasatāya parisāya dhammaṁ deseti.
analyzed: bhūta pubba bhante bhagavā aneka satāya parisāya dhammaṃ deseti

original: Tatraññataro bhagavato sāvako ukkāsi.
analyzed: tatra aññataraḥ bhagavataḥ sāvakaḥ ukkā asi

original: Tamenaṁ aññataro sabrahmacārī jaṇṇukena ghaṭṭesi:
analyzed: tam enam aññataraḥ sabrahmacārī jaṇṇukena ghaṭṭesi

original: ‘appasaddo āyasmā hotu, māyasmā saddamakāsi; satthā no bhagavā dhammaṁ desetī’ti.
analyzed: appasaddaḥ āyasman hotu mā ayasman saddam akāsi satthā naḥ bhagavā dhammaṃ deseti iti

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhante, etadahosi:
analyzed: tassa mayha bhante

original: ‘acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho.
analyzed: acchariyam vata bho abbhutam vata bho

original: Adaṇḍena vata kira, bho, asatthena evaṁ suvinītā parisā bhavissatī’ti.
analyzed: a daṇḍena vata kira bho asatthena evam su vinītā parisā bhavissati iti

original: Na kho panāhaṁ, bhante, ito bahiddhā aññaṁ evaṁ suvinītaṁ parisaṁ samanupassāmi.
analyzed: na kho pana aha bhante itas bahiddhā aññam evam su vinītam parisam samanupassāmi

original: Ayampi kho me, bhante, bhagavati dhammanvayo hoti:
analyzed: ayam pi kho me bhante bhagavati dhamma anvayaḥ hoti

original: ‘sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo, suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho’ti.
analyzed: sammāsambuddhaḥ bhagavā su ākkhātaḥ bhagavatā dhammo su paṭipannaḥ bhagavataḥ sāvaka saṅghaḥ iti

original: Puna caparāhaṁ, bhante, passāmi idhekacce khattiyapaṇḍite nipuṇe kataparappavāde vālavedhirūpe. Te bhindantā maññe caranti paññāgatena diṭṭhigatāni.
analyzed: puna caparā āha bhante passāmi idha ekacce khattiya paṇḍite nipuṇe kata para ppavāde vāla vedhi rūpe te bhindantā maññe caranti paññāgatena diṭṭhi gatāni

original: Te suṇanti:
analyzed: te suṇanti

original: ‘samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo amukaṁ nāma gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā osarissatī’ti.
analyzed: samaṇaḥ khalu bho gotamaḥ amukam nāma gāmam vā nigamam vā osarissati iti

original: Te pañhaṁ abhisaṅkharonti:
analyzed: te pañham abhisaṅkharonti

original: ‘imaṁ mayaṁ pañhaṁ samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāma.
analyzed: imam mayam pañham samaṇam gotamam upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāma

original: Evañce no puṭṭho evaṁ byākarissati, evamassa mayaṁ vādaṁ āropessāma;
analyzed: evam ce no puṭṭhaḥ evam byākarissati evam assa mayam vādam āropessāma

original: evañcepi no puṭṭho evaṁ byākarissati, evampissa mayaṁ vādaṁ āropessāmā’ti.
analyzed: evam ce pi no puṭṭhaḥ evam byākarissati evam pissa mayam vādam āropessāma ati

original: Te suṇanti:
analyzed: te suṇanti

original: ‘samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo amukaṁ nāma gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā osaṭo’ti.
analyzed: samaṇaḥ khalu bho gotamaḥ amukam nāma gāmam vā nigamam vā osaṭaḥ iti

original: Te yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamanti.
analyzed: te yena bhagavān tena upasaṅkamanti

original: Te bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṁseti.
analyzed: te bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaseti

original: Te bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṁsitā na ceva bhagavantaṁ pañhaṁ pucchanti, kuto vādaṁ āropessanti?
analyzed: te bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahasitā na ca iva bhagavantam pañham pucchanti kutas vādam āropessanti

original: Aññadatthu bhagavato sāvakā sampajjanti.
analyzed: aññadatthu bhagavataḥ sāvakā sampajjanti

original: Ayampi kho me, bhante, bhagavati dhammanvayo hoti:
analyzed: ayam pi kho me bhante bhagavati dhamma anvayaḥ hoti

original: ‘sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo, suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho’ti.
analyzed: sammāsambuddhaḥ bhagavā su ākkhātaḥ bhagavatā dhammo su paṭipannaḥ bhagavataḥ sāvaka saṅghaḥ iti

original: Puna caparāhaṁ, bhante, passāmi idhekacce brāhmaṇapaṇḍite …pe…
analyzed: puna ca parāha bhante passāmi idha ekacce brāhmaṇa paṇḍite pe

original: gahapatipaṇḍite …pe…
analyzed: gahapati paṇḍite pe

original: samaṇapaṇḍite nipuṇe kataparappavāde vālavedhirūpe. Te bhindantā maññe caranti paññāgatena diṭṭhigatāni.
analyzed: samaṇa paṇḍite nipuṇe kata para ppavāde vāla vedhi rūpe te bhindantā maññe caranti paññāgatena diṭṭhi gatāni

original: Te suṇanti:
analyzed: te suṇanti

original: ‘samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo amukaṁ nāma gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā osarissatī’ti.
analyzed: samaṇaḥ khalu bho gotamaḥ amukam nāma gāmam vā nigamam vā osarissati iti

original: Te pañhaṁ abhisaṅkharonti:
analyzed: te pañham abhisaṅkharonti

original: ‘imaṁ mayaṁ pañhaṁ samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāma.
analyzed: imam mayam pañham samaṇam gotamam upasaṅkamitvā pucchissāma

original: Evañce no puṭṭho evaṁ byākarissati, evamassa mayaṁ vādaṁ āropessāma;
analyzed: evam ce no puṭṭhaḥ evam byākarissati evam assa mayam vādam āropessāma

original: evañcepi no puṭṭho evaṁ byākarissati, evampissa mayaṁ vādaṁ āropessāmā’ti.
analyzed: evam ce pi no puṭṭhaḥ evam byākarissati evam pissa mayam vādam āropessāma ati

original: Te suṇanti:
analyzed: te suṇanti

original: ‘samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo amukaṁ nāma gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā osaṭo’ti.
analyzed: samaṇaḥ khalu bho gotamaḥ amukam nāma gāmam vā nigamam vā osaṭaḥ iti

original: Te yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamanti.
analyzed: te yena bhagavān tena upasaṅkamanti

original: Te bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaṁseti.
analyzed: te bhagavā dhammiyā kathāya sandasseti samādapeti samuttejeti sampahaseti

original: Te bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahaṁsitā na ceva bhagavantaṁ pañhaṁ pucchanti, kuto vādaṁ āropessanti?
analyzed: te bhagavatā dhammiyā kathāya sandassitā samādapitā samuttejitā sampahasitā na ca iva bhagavantam pañham pucchanti kutas vādam āropessanti

original: Aññadatthu bhagavantaṁyeva okāsaṁ yācanti agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajjāya.
analyzed: aññadatthu bhagavantayā iva okāsam yācanti agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajjāya

original: Te bhagavā pabbājeti.
analyzed: te bhagavā pabbājeti

original: Te tathāpabbajitā samānā ekā vūpakaṭṭhā appamattā ātāpino pahitattā viharantā nacirasseva—yassatthāya
analyzed: te tathā pabbajitā samānāḥ ekāḥ vūpakaṭṭhāḥ appamattāḥ ātāpinaḥ pahita ttāḥ viharantā

original: kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ
analyzed: kula puttā sammad eva agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajanti tad anuttara brahmacariya pariyosāna

original: diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti.
analyzed: diṭṭhe iva dhamme sayam abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharanti

original: Te evamāhaṁsu:
analyzed: te

original: ‘manaṁ vata, bho, anassāma; manaṁ vata, bho, panassāma’.
analyzed: manam vata bho anassāma manam vata bho panassāma

original: Mayañhi pubbe assamaṇāva samānā samaṇāmhāti paṭijānimhā, abrāhmaṇāva samānā brāhmaṇāmhāti paṭijānimhā, anarahantova samānā arahantāmhāti paṭijānimhā.
analyzed: mayan hi pubbe assamaṇā ava samānā samaṇā amha ati paṭijānimhā abrāhmaṇā ava samānā brāhmaṇā amha ati paṭijānimhā an arahantaḥ uva samānāḥ arahantā amha ati paṭijānimhā

original: ‘Idāni khomha samaṇā, idāni khomha brāhmaṇā, idāni khomha arahanto’ti.
analyzed: idāni khomha samaṇāḥ idāni khomha brāhmaṇāḥ idāni khomha arahantaḥ iti

original: Ayampi kho me, bhante, bhagavati dhammanvayo hoti:
analyzed: ayam pi kho me bhante bhagavati dhamma anvayaḥ hoti

original: ‘sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo, suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho’ti.
analyzed: sammāsambuddhaḥ bhagavā su ākkhātaḥ bhagavatā dhammo su paṭipannaḥ bhagavataḥ sāvaka saṅghaḥ iti

original: Puna caparāhaṁ, bhante, ime isidattapurāṇā thapatayo mamabhattā mamayānā, ahaṁ nesaṁ jīvikāya dātā, yasassa āhattā;
analyzed: puna caparāha bhante ime isidatta purāṇāḥ thapatayaḥ mamabhattāḥ aham na īsam jīvikāya dātā yasassa āhattā

original: atha ca pana no tathā mayi nipaccakāraṁ karonti yathā bhagavati.
analyzed: atha ca pana no tathā mayi nipaccakāram karonti yathā bhagavati

original: Bhūtapubbāhaṁ, bhante, senaṁ abbhuyyāto samāno ime ca isidattapurāṇā thapatayo vīmaṁsamāno aññatarasmiṁ sambādhe āvasathe vāsaṁ upagacchiṁ.
analyzed: bhūta pubbā āha bhante senam abbhuyyātaḥ samānaḥ ime ca isidatta purāṇāḥ thapatayaḥ aññatarasmin sambādhe āvasathe vāsam upagacchi

original: Atha kho, bhante, ime isidattapurāṇā thapatayo bahudeva rattiṁ dhammiyā kathāya vītināmetvā, yato ahosi bhagavā tato sīsaṁ katvā maṁ pādato karitvā nipajjiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho bhante ime isidatta purāṇāḥ thapatayaḥ bahu deva rattim dhammiyā kathāya vītināmetvā yatas ahosi bhagavā tatas sīsam katvā mam pādataḥ karitvā nipajjisu

original: Tassa mayhaṁ, bhante, etadahosi:
analyzed: tassa mayha bhante

original: ‘acchariyaṁ vata bho, abbhutaṁ vata bho.
analyzed: acchariyam vata bho abbhutam vata bho

original: Ime isidattapurāṇā thapatayo mamabhattā mamayānā, ahaṁ nesaṁ jīvikāya dātā, yasassa āhattā;
analyzed: ime isidatta purāṇā thapatayaḥ mamabhattāḥ mamayānāḥ aham na isam jīvikāya dātā yasassa āhattā

original: atha ca pana no tathā mayi nipaccakāraṁ karonti yathā bhagavati.
analyzed: atha ca pana no tathā mayi nipaccakāram karonti yathā bhagavati

original: Addhā ime āyasmanto tassa bhagavato sāsane uḷāraṁ pubbenāparaṁ visesaṁ jānantī’ti.
analyzed: addhā ime āyasmantaḥ tassa bhagavato sāsane uḷāram pubbena aparam visesam jānanti iti

original: Ayampi kho me, bhante, bhagavati dhammanvayo hoti:
analyzed: ayam pi kho me bhante bhagavati dhamma anvayaḥ hoti

original: ‘sammāsambuddho bhagavā, svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo, suppaṭipanno bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho’ti.
analyzed: sammāsambuddhaḥ bhagavā su ākkhātaḥ bhagavatā dhammo su paṭipannaḥ bhagavataḥ sāvaka saṅghaḥ iti

original: Puna caparaṁ, bhante, bhagavāpi khattiyo, ahampi khattiyo;
analyzed: puna capara bhante bhagavā api khattiyaḥ aham pi khattiyaḥ

original: bhagavāpi kosalo, ahampi kosalo;
analyzed: bhagavā api kosalaḥ aham pi kosalaḥ

original: bhagavāpi āsītiko, ahampi āsītiko.
analyzed: bhagavān api āsītikaḥ aham pi āsītikaḥ

original: Yampi, bhante, bhagavāpi khattiyo ahampi khattiyo, bhagavāpi kosalo ahampi kosalo, bhagavāpi āsītiko ahampi āsītiko;
analyzed: yam pi bhante bhagavā api khattiyaḥ aham pi khattiyaḥ bhagavā api kosalaḥ aham pi kosalaḥ bhagavā api āsītikaḥ aham pi āsītikaḥ

original: imināvārahāmevāhaṁ, bhante, bhagavati paramanipaccakāraṁ kātuṁ, mittūpahāraṁ upadaṁsetuṁ.
analyzed: bhante bhagavati parama nipad cakāram kātu mittūpahāram upadasetu

original: Handa ca dāni mayaṁ, bhante, gacchāma;
analyzed: handa ca dāni maya bhante gacchāma

original: bahukiccā mayaṁ bahukaraṇīyā”ti.
analyzed: bahu kitcā mayam bahu karaṇīyā ati

original: “Yassadāni tvaṁ, mahārāja, kālaṁ maññasī”ti.
analyzed: yaḥ sadāni tva mahā rāja kālam maññasi iti

original: Atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalo uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṁ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṁ katvā pakkāmi.
analyzed: atha kho rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ uṭṭhāya āsanā bhagavantam abhivādetvā padakkhiṇam katvā pakkāmi

original: Atha kho bhagavā acirapakkantassa rañño pasenadissa kosalassa bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā acira pakkantassa raññaḥ pasenadissa kosalassa bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “eso, bhikkhave, rājā pasenadi kosalo dhammacetiyāni bhāsitvā uṭṭhāyāsanā pakkanto.
analyzed: esaḥ bhikkhave rājā pasenadi kosalaḥ dhamma cetiyāni bhāsitvā uṭṭhāya āsanā pakkantaḥ

original: Uggaṇhatha, bhikkhave, dhammacetiyāni;
analyzed: uggaṇhatha bhikkhave dhamma cetiyāni

original: pariyāpuṇātha, bhikkhave, dhammacetiyāni;
analyzed: pariyāpuṇātha bhikkhave dhamma cetiyāni

original: dhāretha, bhikkhave, dhammacetiyāni.
analyzed: dhāretha bhikkhave dhamma cetiyāni

original: Atthasaṁhitāni, bhikkhave, dhammacetiyāni ādibrahmacariyakānī”ti.
analyzed: attha sahitāni bhikkhave dhamma cetiyāni ādi brahmacariyakāni iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Dhammacetiyasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ navamaṁ.
analyzed: dhammacetiya suttam niṭṭhitam navama
